programme.desc: Paddington becomes a Talent Show Judge / Paddington Keeps Up With The Kamalis - It's the Windsor Gardens Pet show, Paddington is the judge but they're all so talented how can he choose? / Paddington Judy & Jonathan learn that playing with your neighbors is more fun than trying to outdo them even if Toq keeps copying their ideas!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S02 Ep224
programme.desc: Paddington's Pet Hotel / Paddington Plays Golf - Paddington opens Windsor Gardens' first ever pet hotel when he has Lucky to stay over. // Baaz has set up a mini golf course at the park, but is it really unbeatable like he says and how should you hold a club Paddington?

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep415
programme.desc: Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard - Grandpa Pig needs help when his boat sinks, so Granddad Dog gives them all a lift to Grampy Rabbit's Boatyard so that the boat can be fixed.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep416
programme.desc: Shake, Rattle and Bang - Madame Gazelle gives the class a music lesson. There's lots of crashing and banging at first, but it's not long before the grown-ups visit and lay down some notes of their own.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep417
programme.desc: Champion Daddy Pig - Daddy Pig loses his title as Champion Puddle Jumper during the Daddi-Olympics, so everyone helps him train to win it back at the Daddi-Olympics.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S04 Ep418
programme.desc: Chatterbox - Peppa Pig talks far too much. Or at least so Suzy thinks. In response, Peppa decides that she is never going to talk, ever again. But this does not last for very long at all.

programme.title: Bubble Guppies S06 Ep604
programme.desc: The SS Friendship! - Captain Deemo (Deema) and First Mate Gil pilot their steampunk sub to different ocean habitats so they can deliver Friendship Day Bubblegrams to all their friends. But along the way, they find themselves being chased by a Kraken!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep305
programme.desc: Building with Blue - Josh invites YOU to be a part of the construction crew! Blue and Magenta are building something special, and we need to play Blue and Magenta's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep306
programme.desc: A Blue's Clues Festival of Lights - Everyone's at Periwinkle's house celebrating Hanukkah, the festival of lights! Well, not everyone, exactly. There's a special, surprise guest coming to our Hanukkah party, and we'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out!

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S05 Ep507
programme.desc: Ice Cream Monster Machine - Gasquatch invites Blaze and AJ to his ice cream party! But he forgot something important - the ice cream! So, Blaze transforms into an Ice Cream Truck and races to reach Gasquatch's house in time!

programme.title: Santiago of the Seas S01 Ep113
programme.desc: The Silver Lasso / The Sea Dragon's Treasure - Santiago and Mami team up to take down an old foe and retrieve a lost family treasure. // After Enrique nabs a Sea Dragon's golden egg, it's up to the good pirates to nab it back before things get out of control.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S01 Ep114
programme.desc: Busy Baby - Baby Shark bites off more than he can chew before his big dance party with Grandma Shark.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S08 Ep812
programme.desc: Pups Save a Chicken Tulip / Pups Stop an Xtreme Shark - When Mayor Humdinger and his mother help Mayor Goodway look for a rare tulip, Humdinger's attempts to have his mom find the flower first gets them all in trouble. // The Pups must save Daring Danny X when a mechanical shark stunt that goes awry.

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S01 Ep102
programme.desc: Paddington Makes Pancakes / Paddington Plays Football - Paddington rescues Pancake Day after Mrs. Bird hurts her arms snowboarding and can't make pancakes. // Jonathan teaches Paddington football, but Paddington kicks the ball into Mr. Curry's garden. They decide to get it back by climbing over the fence.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep605
programme.desc: The Aquarium - Goldie the Goldfish is feeling a little lonely, so Peppa takes her to the aquarium.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep606
programme.desc: George's Racing Car - It's a beautiful day, but Peppa, George, Daddy Pig, and Grandpa Pig are sitting inside watching racecar driving on television!

programme.title: Peppa Pig S06 Ep607
programme.desc: The Little Boat - Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake?

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep169
programme.desc: The Key - Because of her fear of spiders, Froga locks herself and Ron in the greenhouse to collecting Strawberries for the friends' Strawberry Snack time Musical Feast. But when it is time to leave, she can't locate the key...

programme.title: Anna & Friends S01 Ep170
programme.desc: Fruits Surprise - When Froga and Christopher realize that Anna and Bubu may be making a "fruit surprises" for Snack Time, they try everything they can to preserve the two surprises. Froga and Christopher realized how difficult preserving a surprise can be!

programme.title: Blue's Clues & You S03 Ep302
programme.desc: Blue's Dino Clues - It's a prehistoric game of Blue's Clues when a mysterious dinosaur egg falls out of the skidoo frame and starts to hatch! We figure out what kind of dinosaur is inside the egg so we can reunite the egg with their family.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep10
programme.desc: The Cheese Badge - Duggee and the Squirrels go on a mission to contain an outbreak when Roly inadvertently goes on the run with the world's smelliest cheese, earning their Cheese badges in the process.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep11
programme.desc: The Radio Badge - The Squirrels stumble upon some of Duggee's old radio equipment and decide to start their own show.

programme.title: Hey Duggee (S3) Ep12
programme.desc: The Opposites Badge - The Squirrels have fun learning what opposites are, with a little bit of help from a lot of topsy-turvy animal friends!

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep43
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Dream Team Trouble - After Glitch accidentally destroys part of the Academy, he and Ubercorn have a huge argument. When he heads to Grim HQ to make amends, Ubercorn is accidentally trapped.

programme.title: Go Jetters (S3) Ep44
programme.desc: Cave Train Trouble, Slovenia - Glitch has taken Tala on holiday to Slovenia's Postojna Caves, and she is looking forward to finding a rare creature called an olm for her class project. Ubercorn and Lars join them.

programme.title: Kit and Pup (S1) Ep26
programme.desc: Big and Small - Kit and Pup are at the park playing with a tennis ball, a basketball and a beach ball. Can you see which is the biggest and which is the smallest?

programme.title: Yakka Dee (S5) Ep20
programme.desc: Snow - Dee encourages a friend to say `snow', and goes on a whirlwind word adventure. They see lots of snow, cold snow, falling snow, twinkly snow and yummy snow.

programme.title: Teletubbies (S1) Ep98
programme.desc: Up High - The Teletubbies bounce on The Tubby Bouncy. Po bounces as high as a cloud, then Laa-Laa bounces higher, Dipsy bounces even higher and Tinky Winky bounces highest of all.

programme.title: Clangers (S3) Ep11
programme.desc: Finders Keepers - When Tiny is bored and can't find anyone to play with, Major invents a new ball game.

programme.title: Dinopaws (S1) Ep25
programme.desc: The Thing We Looked Through - The Dinopaws invent a new game called Look-at-Me, but they break the toy they are playing with.

programme.title: Tinpo (S1) Ep38
programme.desc: Meow Mountain - Tinpotown's "eye in the sky" helicopter Pilot Po doesn't want to take his eyes of his new pet kitten.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep38
programme.desc: Do Elephants Forget - After he forgets to do his chores and empty his lunchbox, Monty wonders if it's possible for someone to remember everything.

programme.title: Kazoops! (S1) Ep39
programme.desc: Dad Dancing - Stan doesn't want to dance because he's not good at it, leaving Monty wondering whether you have to be good at things to enjoy them.

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep16
programme.desc: I Completely Know About Guinea Pigs - Lola is chosen to look after the class guinea pig for the holidays. She tries to make sure she knows everything about guinea pigs, but does she?

programme.title: Charlie and Lola (S2) Ep17
programme.desc: What If I Get Lost in the Middle of Nowhere? - A surprise school trip is planned, and Lola starts to worry that she might get lost, so she prepares with bright clothes, whistles, and pebbles.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep12
programme.desc: One Boot Off - Nelly and Nora help Oliver rescue his boot from a muddy puddle.

programme.title: Nelly and Nora (S1) Ep13
programme.desc: Frosted In - Nelly and Nora figure out how to walk around without slipping on icy patches.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep5
programme.desc: Train Fudge - Sarah and Duck take an unexpected train trip whilst on their quest to buy some fudge.

programme.title: Sarah and Duck (S3) Ep6
programme.desc: Magic Panic - Umbrella needs Sarah and Duck's help after he promises to put on a magic show.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends (S14) Ep8
programme.desc: Diesel's Special Delivery - Diesel swaps his dull load of slate for a haul of shiny red apples in order to please Sodor's school children.

programme.title: Bluey (S1) Ep18

programme.desc: Dog Loves Sleepy Time Rhymes - Pug tries to remember an old nursery rhyme. He and Dog go to a fair where they meet the cat and the fiddle, the cow that jumps over the moon and the dish that ran away with the spoon.

programme.title: Back Roads - Leonora, WA Ep14
programme.desc: Sr. 8 - Heather Ewart travels to Leonora in the goldfields of WA. 800km north-east of Perth, its home to Australia's richest road mile running race and where heptathlete-turned-bobsleigh Winter Olympian Kiara Reddingius was raised.

programme.title: Inside Central Station Ep5
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - As we mark the anniversary of Australia's worst train disaster, we meet the team who use state-of-the-art technology to keep the network safe. A violent machete attack at a suburban station leaves ROC security baffled.

programme.title: Life On The Outside Ep1
programme.desc: Sr. 1 - Amanda welcomes Sierra after 13 months in jail while a family on the north shore brace themselves to house Jeremy who has been to prison 14 times and in Sydney's west Wayne and Julie open their home to serial offender Brett.

programme.title: Art Works Ep14

programme.title: Anh's Brush With Fame - Manu Feildel Ep7
programme.desc: Sr. 6 - French chef Manu Feildel's passion for entertaining has made him a regular on our TV screens over the last decade. Anh captures the desire, determination and flair of a man who has worked hard for every opportunity.

programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Activate Your Japanese!
programme.desc: Learn how to make the most of your Japanese skills. Watch our drama that features useful communication strategies, our snappy videos about onomatopoeia, and our documentaries on "senpai" in Japan.

programme.title: Bosai: Winter Fire Precautions
programme.desc: The fact that Japan is very dry in winter greatly increases the risk of fire. We learn tips for preventing fires occurring and how to respond effectively when a fire breaks out.

programme.title: Dining With The Chef Mini
programme.desc: Featured recipes: (1) Crispy Pork Stir-fry with Myoga and Green Beans (2) Stir-fried Eggplant and Shishito with Miso Sauce. Learn about Japanese home cooking with Chef Saito in five minutes!

programme.title: Newsline Asia 24
programme.desc: This daily news program picks up the key news stories of the past 24 hours from Japan and around Asia.

programme.title: Seasoning The Seasons
programme.desc: This program visits places across Japan to introduce the charms of their local daily life and festivals fostered by the nation's long history. Today, Mikan: Japan's Favorite Citrus Fruit.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline Biz
programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: Japan From Above: Up Close
programme.desc: This program takes you on an aerial journey across 21st century Japan. Enjoy the bird's-eye view of unique landscapes as well as intimate portraits of the people who inhabit the archipelago.

programme.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
programme.desc: A summer ride through Fukui, where wealth and culture grew out of centuries of trade with the old capital, Kyoto. Traditional crafts continue to evolve, thanks to the region's spirit of innovation.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Maeno Ould Koutaro studies the desert locust, a creature that has wreaked havoc on humanity since the dawn of civilization. His extensive field research has increased our understanding of the insect.

programme.title: J-Melo
programme.desc: Join May J. for Japanese music! This week's acts are known for anime songs. Moriguchi Hiroko has sung a string of Gundam themes; fhana are a four-piece band popular at international anime events.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK World-Japan's flagship hourly news program delivers the latest world news, business and weather, with a focus on Japan and the rest of Asia.

programme.title: Newsline Biz
programme.desc: Reporting the latest business, finance and economic news, with added analysis from studio guests.

programme.title: Where We Call Home
programme.desc: We meet Myanmar-born Aung Moe Oo who leads a fishing enterprise on Nakanoshima Island off the coast of Shimane, as well as South African Carli Kuschke who works for a plastering company in Tokyo.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Rodriguez vs. Lemos
programme.desc: Prelims - Strawweights intent on making their case for a world title shot in 2023 collide at the APEX in Las Vegas, as Top Five contender Marina Rodriguez battles fellow Brazilian standout Amanda Lemos in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in her last five, Rodriguez’ bonus-winning victories over Amanda Ribas and Mackenzie Dern have made her a fan favorite heading into her showdown with Lemos, who is coming off a Performance of the Night submission win over Michelle Waterson in July. Plus, top-flight welterweights square off in the co-main event, with Neil Magny taking on Daniel Rodriguez.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Rodriguez vs. Lemos
programme.desc: Main Event - Strawweights intent on making their case for a world title shot in 2023 collide at the APEX in Las Vegas, as Top Five contender Marina Rodriguez battles fellow Brazilian standout Amanda Lemos in the main event of UFC Fight Night. Unbeaten in her last five, Rodriguez’ bonus-winning victories over Amanda Ribas and Mackenzie Dern have made her a fan favorite heading into her showdown with Lemos, who is coming off a Performance of the Night submission win over Michelle Waterson in July. Plus, top-flight welterweights square off in the co-main event, with Neil Magny taking on Daniel Rodriguez.

Unbeaten in her last five, Rodriguez’ bonus-winning victories over Amanda Ribas and Mackenzie Dern have made her a fan favorite heading into her showdown with Lemos, who is coming off a Performance of the Night submission win over Michelle Waterson in July. Plus, top-flight welterweights square off in the co-main event, with Neil Magny taking on Daniel Rodriguez.

programme.title: Jom Masak Musim Pertama Ep6
programme.desc: Pemain-pemain bola sepak tempatan menunjukkan kemahiran memasak mereka dan berkongsi pengalaman serta aksi memasak yang pasti mencuit hati. Rancangan ini dapat memberi Inspirasi kepada peminat yang menonton

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep12
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Main Event Ep902BlachowiczvsAdesanya
programme.desc: At UFC 259, middleweight champion Israel Adesanya stepped up in weight as he sought a second belt taking on newly minted light heavyweight champion Jan Blachowicz. See both men train and prepare for their battle for 205-pound gold
